articles.urlToImage: https://imgeng.jagran.com/images/2024/06/30/article/image/delayed ott movies and web series july 2024-1719771615626.jpg
articles.content:
Zwigato
Recent updates indicate that Netflix has secured the digital rights to the film Zwigato. Reports suggest that this movie is scheduled to make its debut on the streaming platform in July. The… [+1028 chars]
